summary.title: Summary
summary.description:
Summary
Have a good day. I specialize in professional create user interface design and development. Over the course of my professional career, I have designed a large number of products, some of which have become flagship products for companies. My experience primarily focuses on visually processing big volumes of data, as I have dedicated a significant portion of my professional activity to the financial sector. My work involves turning complex into straightforward ones. I have been in the industry for over 12 years and hold a Bachelor of Computer Science degree, which allows me to delve deeper into the technical aspects of products. Additionally, I can in product development as a software engineer. If you are interested in my experience, then contact me.

list.description:
• Created a more responsive and user-friendly interface for many of the bank's products and systems, which resulted in increased loyalty and a 25% growth in customers. (Figma)
  • Conducting user experience research. Analyzing and identifying new user behavior trends. (Figma, Prototype, Wireframe, Framer, FigJam, Miro)
  • Maintained and developed the UI-Kit. (Figma, Storybook.js, React.js, Html, CSS)

• Created a new UI kit for the company's website. (Figma-Components, Storybook.js, React.js, Html, CSS) , the UX/UI of the subsidiary company's website. (Figma, Miro)
  • Created the UI and UI kit for the trading terminal application for iOS and Android. Subsequently, this product accounted for over 50% of the profit and became the company's flagship product. (Figma (Components, Prototype, Wireframe), Miro)
  • Created the UX/UI and participated in the development of the company's marketing performance dashboard. (Figma (Components, Prototype, Wireframe), Miro, Js (React, Redux, RESTful API, Google Chart tools), Html, CSS (tailwind), Docker, Postman, Git)
• Created the development of algorithms for data computation and processing big data. (Python, Numpy)

• Supported the legacy code of the project and writing new functionality
  • Was doing migrating the system from Symfony 3.0 to Laravel 10.0 (Php, SQL)
  • Was doing database integration and replication. (Python, PostgresQL, Cassandra)
  • Created and developed the company's website UI. (Figma, Html, CSS, JS)

• Designed UX/UI for promotional websites and advertising banners. (Photoshop, Figma, Sketch)
  • Developed landing pages and HTML banners. (Html, CSS, JS, Php (Lumen, Composer), SQL, Git)
